dict.acceptation: 贡献出；捐赠（款项）；投稿（给杂志等）；出力；

sent.orig: But, she adds, other countries also be willing to contribute contribute more.
sent.trans: 但是，她增加道，其他国家也一定愿意为此作出贡献。

sent.orig: The rich will be asked to contribute money; the strong to contribute labour.
Colloids contribute to the character of the soil in other ways.
sent.trans: 胶质体对土壤的其它性状也有影响。

sent.orig: How can we be sure that what we're reading is accurate, if anyone can contribute?
sent.trans: 如果任何人都可以输入内容，那么我们怎能确定我们读到的内容是准确的呢。

sent.orig: Jamaal Magloire in a truce, the Heat hope that the joy-and David-to contribute more to Padgett.
sent.trans: 在马格洛伊尔休战之后，热队希望乔伊-和大卫-帕吉特能够更多贡献。
